Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress/Central Park
ShortDescription: WB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner & Harrison: due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Congress/Central Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute at 71st/Exchange
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Exp, 26 South Shore Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles & 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express, #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Belmont at this time.

 Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Howard and Belmont in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Byrn Mawr
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Byrn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood and Boradway due to, street blockage near Broadway/Byrn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Byrn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood and Broadway due to, street blockage near Broadway/Byrn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
